channel.title: Developer Blogs on PCSX2
channel.description: Recent content in Developer Blogs on PCSX2

item.title: New Website!
item.description: If you’re reading this post, that means we’ve migrated to our new website. Expect further changes and improvements as we iron out the details.

item.title: AetherSX2 brings PCSX2 to mobile
item.description: As you have probably seen by now, there is a new Android emulator in town called AetherSX2, which shows to have very promising performance and compatibility
